contents:
替代: https://metager.de/en/  & https://www.yandex.com
可以直连 不会包含百度的结果

Verified by privacytools.io
An open-source metasearch engine, which is based in Germany. It focuses on protecting the user's privacy.

edit: add yandex.com
这个metager貌似是整合bing和另一个？引擎的结果

edit2: 看了一下privavytools推荐的几个搜索引擎(除metager)以及Ecosia.org似乎都用bing作数据源，审查版搜索结果的顺序都相同的
